casebody.data:
JOHNSON
v.
JOHNSON 111P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Glenwood F. Johnson, for Johnson, Glenwood F. Whitney Williams, Attorney at Law, John C. Fitzpatrick, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Johnson, Grace Justice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of April 2017 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
